stories.title: Cornell's Merlin app can identify birds by sight and sound

stories.text:
Hello HN,

I was fed up with having to use Ctrl+F because I could never find what I was looking for, so I build an NLP based Find in Page alternative that works pretty damn well.

Let me know what you think,

Scout Team

P.s. you'll soon be able to search through images and the text in them too.
stories.title: Show HN: Is Ctrl+F not finding what you need?
Cisco's Webex phoned home audio telemetry even when muted

stories.text:
I'm fairly certain that I have ADD. I partly feel like it started to get worse over time when utilizing certain platforms designed for to capture peoples attention with short content. I have since stopped using things like Twitter (for various reasons) and any platform that encourages short form content.

What methods are you using outside of avoiding social media?

Thank you for ... oh what's that over there?
stories.title: Ask HN: What methods do you use to focus and stay relaxed?
